author: Special Correspondent
text:
BJP president Amit Shah, who arrived here on Saturday for a two-day visit, will discuss the party’s organisational affairs with the newly appointed party president, Vijay Rupani, who is yet to declare his team that will guide the party to the Assembly polls scheduled to be held in December 2017.

“Chief Minister Anandiben Patel and party president Vijay Rupani will discuss the appointments of new officer-bearers and also about the possible reshuffle in the State Cabinet as Rupani himself is likely to resign from the Cabinet after his appointment in the organisation,” a BJP leader said.

A reshuffle in the Cabinet is likely sometime in April after the budget session of the Assembly gets over on March 31.
title: Amit Shah to discuss postings in Gujarat BJP
